news.title: Explore This Year’s Key Decisions From the United States Supreme Court
news.description: After an eventful Supreme Court term, there is plenty to talk about! Lawyers, you’re invited to join Justia Webinars for a free presentation in which Illinois Law Dean and Professor Vikram Amar and Cornell Law Professor Michael Dorf discuss some of the most important (and interesting) decisions this term.

news.title: Google News Alert: Data Syncing Between Google Local Services Ads and Google Business Profile
news.description: In case you missed it, there was big news earlier this week impacting the Google Business Profiles of law firms advertising with Google Local Services Ads. Read this post for more info.

news.title: Justia Legal Guides: Home Ownership Center
news.description: There’s a lot at stake, financially and legally, when you’re buying or selling a home. Being a homeowner also creates certain obligations. The Justia Home Ownership Center highlights some key issues and concerns to keep in mind.
